channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Zhejiang University on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: DICEPTION: A Generalist Diffusion Model for Visual Perceptual Tasks
item.description: DICEPTION: A generalist diffusion model for visual perceptual tasks.

item.title: Train Small, Infer Large: Memory-Efficient LoRA Training for Large Language Models
item.description: LORAM: Train small, infer large LLMs by memory-efficient LoRA training. Enables 70B parameter model training on a 20G HBM GPU, replacing A100-80G. Reduces parameter storage cost by 15.81x.

item.title: How Do LLMs Acquire New Knowledge? A Knowledge Circuits Perspective on Continual Pre-Training
item.description: LLMs’ knowledge acquisition is unveiled through the lens of evolving knowledge circuits, revealing how new knowledge integration depends on relevance to existing knowledge, exhibiting distinct phases …

item.title: DreamDPO: Aligning Text-to-3D Generation with Human Preferences via Direct Preference Optimization
item.description: DreamDPO: Revolutionizing text-to-3D generation by directly aligning outputs with human preferences via innovative preference optimization.

item.title: InfiGUIAgent: A Multimodal Generalist GUI Agent with Native Reasoning and Reflection
item.description: InfiGUIAgent, a novel multimodal GUI agent, leverages a two-stage training pipeline to achieve advanced reasoning and GUI interaction capabilities, outperforming existing models in benchmarks.

item.title: OneKE: A Dockerized Schema-Guided LLM Agent-based Knowledge Extraction System
item.description: OneKE: a dockerized, schema-guided LLM agent system efficiently extracts knowledge from diverse sources, offering adaptability and robust error handling.

item.title: Orient Anything: Learning Robust Object Orientation Estimation from Rendering 3D Models
item.description: Orient Anything: Learning robust object orientation estimation directly from rendered 3D models, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy on real images.

item.title: Prompting Depth Anything for 4K Resolution Accurate Metric Depth Estimation
item.description: Prompting unlocks 4K metric depth from low-cost LiDAR.

item.title: ZipAR: Accelerating Autoregressive Image Generation through Spatial Locality
item.description: ZipAR accelerates autoregressive image generation by up to 91% through parallel decoding leveraging spatial locality in images, making high-resolution image generation significantly faster.

item.title: Distilling Diffusion Models to Efficient 3D LiDAR Scene Completion
item.description: ScoreLiDAR: Distilling diffusion models for 5x faster, higher-quality 3D LiDAR scene completion!
